alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:25PM CDT until June 29 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Moulton, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moulton, Speake, Mt Hope, Bankhead National Forest, Wren and Landersville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
